subject: Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky Derby winner Mine That Bird will undergo minor surgery for an entrapped epiglottis, but remains on track to compete in the $1 million Travers Stakes on Aug. 29.
snippet: The Kentucky Derby winner Mine That Bird will undergo minor surgery for an entrapped epiglottis, but remains on track to compete in the $1 million Travers Stakes on Aug. 29.
